title: Spiritual Healing Center - Mill Valley, CA
description: Specialties: The Spiritual Healing Center offers Spiritual Healing, Meditation, Intuitive Development, Meditation, Yoga and Pilates. The Spiritual Healing Center offers on-going Tuesday Evening Meditation and Healing at 7PM. Sunday Morning Meditation at 11AM. Established in 1979. The Spiritual Healing Center is a Church. Spiritual Healing Center was incorporated in 1999 and was granted exemption status in 2004 by the IRS and the State of California. The Spiritual Healing Center is in a big beautiful church building in downtown Mill Valley.

Carol teaches great easy-to-use, everyday tools each month at her "Chakra Workshops". This is truly a hidden hot-spot in Marin. - 5/12/2019 Carol's Tuesday evening meditations are astounding! Her profound guided meditation will leave you amazed! Not only did I "go places", but I also saw the pure light of my heart space. Divine light...bright, bright, bright light...what a connection. With Carol's guidance, everything is possible..and what a gift to yourself to get here and experience this spiritual car wash. Believe me, you will not be disappointed. Do it for YOU.
